title: Bella Sara Digitala Arkiv
signup_create_desc: "Create" will create a user with the entered username, as long as you still have enough user slots open.
signup_import_desc: "Import" allows you to enter the saved data exported from another navigator to be able to play on any username anywhere.
signup_delete_desc: "Delete" will delete all data for the current user.
signup_export_desc: "Export" will give you the saved data of the current user, allowing you to import it on another navigator.
footer_maininfos:
För frågor, kommentarer, eller hjälp:
@Archiving i Bella Sara Discord eller öppna en diskussion på Our Github
devlog_summary:
Here is the current state of the archiving of the Bella Sara website games:

We have successfully managed to locate and restore several of the original Flash games from the Bella Sara website thanks to archived pages and caches. These include Art Studio, Spectacular Jumping Game, Dreamrider, Magic Bubble Wand, Cloud Jumper, Treasure's Hunt, Jigsaw Puzzle, Coloring Game (Fiona only), Memory Game, Santo's Quiz, the Baby Bella ad, the old and new versions of the World Map.

Additionally, we have partially recovered or restored the files for several other games, such as Lance Riding, Storybook, My Horse (sprite only), Firelight Festival, My Cottage, Citrustacked and Bellisimo's Jumping Contest. These games are still undergoing work to fully restore their original functionalities, and many games are missing files (e.g., the Lance Riding game is missing the files for the later levels).

We also found files for some other games, that we are trying on repairing to have them working again, such as the Bazaar, Wheel of Wonders, the newest version of CloudJumper, and Marvelous Magic Match

Unfortunately, some games remain missing or seem to be permanently broken (e.g., Bella's Beauty Box). To address this, we have started recreating a few of these games using the Phaser framework. As of this update, the Stables, the Spectacular Jumping Game, Citrustacked, Bellapedia, Yin and Yang's Memory Game and Belo's Quizare all available to play, although still as a work in progress.

Beyond restoring the original games, we have also started creating custom games inspired by the ones from the website. Currently, four are available: a Random Art Idea Generator, a Dress-Up Game based on the Stables, an Adventures Quiz and Autumn Journey Quiz based on Belo's Quiz. We are also considering of soon recreating Trailblazer, Wheel of Wonders, Marvelous Magic Match, Bella's Beauty Box, and even a first prototype for Adventures.

We do hope to eventually restore or recreate all the games from the site if we can, but this will obviously take time. If you would like to help us out or would like a more detailed overview of this project, we would recommend starting here: Bella Sara Archival Notes. This project is a community effort and every little bit helps!

In the latest updates, we added a simple user system, which should hopefully allow us to soon recreate the Foal care system, as well as the Cottage's decorations. As of now, the games linked to each user are: Art Studio for the paintings, Magic Bubble Wand for the highscore and horseshoes, Spectacular Jumping Game for the horseshoes on both the original and the recreated version, and the level reached on the recreated version only for now, Treasure's Hunt for the highscore, Citrustacked for the highscore on both original and recreated versions, Bello's Quiz, Adventures Quiz, and Autumn Journey Quiz for the highscore, Firelight Festival for the highscore and horseshoes, Bellisimo's Jumping Contest for the highscore, and the Dress Up Game for saving up to 10 custom horses. The rest of the games will slowly be linked too in the next updates.
play_recoveredflashgames_desc: Detta är spel som var arkiverade från original sidan
play_recreatedgames_desc: Detta är spel som har blivit återskapade med ny kodning
play_partiallyrecoveredgames_desc: Detta är spel som var arkiverade från original sidan men som saknar vissa filer eller grundläggande funktioner.
play_newgames_desc: Detta är spel som har Bella Sara tema eller är Bella Sara inspirerade.
artstudio_warning: Detta spel saknar filerna till de originala hästarna.
lanceriding_warning: Detta spel har endast filerna för första nivån. Spelet har även problem med att ladda effektivt och därför kan det krävas att man laddar om sidan ett par gånger innan det funkar.
storybook_warning: I detta spel verkar man inte kunna stänga av ljudet när man går till nästa sida i boken. Videos spelas inte heller alltid upp som förväntat.
newmap_warning: Vissa länkar går därför till vår wiki eftersom de inte blivit återskapade ännu.
oldmap_warning: Vissa länkar är obrukbara eftersom spelen inte blivit återskapade ännu.
belloquiz_warning: På grund av brist på referenser är kanske inte denna återskapning 100% rätt.
bazaar_warning: Currently, the text is not yet working everywhere and you will need to right click the game and hit play to get past the loading screen. Objects are also not appearing.
firelight_warning: SEIZURE WARNING: The show portion of this game includes flashing lights! The game is quite laggy on certain browsers..
citrustacked_warning: Some texts are not yet appearing correctly. The 'Continue' button doesn't always work correctly yet either.
jumpinggame_warning: The game can be quite laggy at times.
cottage_warning: The objects are not yet added back in the cottage or gallery. You will need to right click the game and hit play to get past the loading screen.
bellisimojumpingcontest_warning: The game is missing the level data file. A very short level has been created as a test and may not be 100% accurate. The game also seems to have trouble loading elements when running too fast.
puzzle_goCustom: Klicka här för att skapa ett pussel med egen bild
puzzle_custom_warning: Notera att bilder större än 700 x 450 kan vara för stora för att ses ordentligt.
puzzle_custom_warning2: Bilder större än 700 x 450 kanske inte syns helt!
dressup_gostable: Go back to the Horse Selection menu
babybella_timeline_information: Denna reklam har uppdaterats ett flertal gånger under sitt liv. Med denna tidslinje kan du nu se hur den såg ut ett visst datum.
cloudjumper_timeline_information: Two slightly different versions of the game were saved from the official website. Here, you can choose which one you wish to play:
about_text:
The Neocities Bella Sara is an archival website made for saving, fixing and recreating the old Bella Sara flash games from the original website to prevent them from being fully lost to time.

This project is open to anyone who wish to help, and you can find out more here.
